name: Seafarer
description: You lived your life on rivers or seas, steering ships or mending sails. Salt is in your blood.

feature.name: Ship Passage
feature.description: You can secure passage on friendly ships for yourself and your companions. In return, you may be expected to assist the crew during the voyage.

traits.text: I tell tall tales of the sea.
I use nautical terms in everyday speech.
I am superstitious about the sea.
I am restless when away from water.
I can predict weather by smell and wind.
I work best as part of a crew.
I am never seasick but hate horses.

ideals.text: Freedom. The sea makes all equal.
Respect. Every sailor earns their place.
Mastery. I will captain my own ship.
Fairness. We all share the dangers and rewards.
People. I'm committed to my crewmates.
Aspiration. Someday I'll own a fleet.

bonds.text: I love my ship more than life.
My captain gave me a chance when no one else would.
I seek vengeance on pirates who killed my crew.
I carry a map to hidden treasure.
I will return to the sea where my loved one was lost.
The sea is my home, not any port.

flaws.text: I cannot swim, which I hide desperately.
I brawl at the slightest provocation.
I abandoned ship once and feel guilty.
I trust the sea more than people.
